message.text: | PLUM* will restart in roughly #tmin minutes. Stay down for the come up.
| In Remembrance of Taylor Feick aka MindFr34k - From Volsung, The Union, The Black Code, and The NETWORk* | R.I.P Grits'N'Scrill
|| With gratitude extended to all of our Premium Supporters + all who help projects like ours stay in operation.
| Server Feedback can be submitted on our Discord for community vote.
|| For any questions or concerns regarding PLUM*, please contact iLLMannerSevs or RxmYxm via Discord.
| Link your account(s) on our Discord to track stats, earn achievements, and earn in-game currency to purchase from our shop.
| https://discord.gg/dayznetwork | The DayZ NETWORk* on Discord | 1st.Gen Survivors of the DayZ on Xbox Community | Est.Feb.16th.2019
|| ATTN: SERVER WIPE NOTICE -- Oct. 15th -- ATTN: SERVER WIPE NOTICE
|| Base Raid Damage Enabled Fridays - Sundays. Boosting into Bases is NOT allowed.
| Player spawn points are set to Cherno, Staroye, Zelenogorsk, Stary Sobor, and Novy Sobor. Explore the map for immersive overhauled cities and towns.
|| Welcome to PLUM* hosted by The DayZ NETWORk* | v1.25
